name: Train Express
description:
Play the best idle train game on your mobile device!

Train Express has a very simple gameplay: buy, upgrade and manage your trains and cities, so you can earn money and unlock new cities and stations. Upgrade your buildings for more profit and complete the Ultimate Challenge - constructing The Dream Express!

• Build and manage tons of train models.
• Expand your train empire with different buildings and structures
• Upgrade buildings and get various boosts
• Discover various landscapes - Desert, Forest, Mountain, Tropical, and more
• Meet The Conductor and learn how to become rich and a successful entrepreneur
